channel.title: Server say's Loading - Please wait, then logs me out?
channel.description:
Ok the problem is, whenever I try to log in to the server I type my Name & Password after loading Source & Client fine, and then it says Logging in - Please Wait, Then Loading - Please wait in a black box appears at the top, it stays like this for a while until eventually, it takes me back to the bit where I type my Name & Password
If anyone can help please tell me, it will be very much appreciated.
Thought Pictures might help:
[img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g425/Frostyfuz/HELPMEEEEE.png[/img] [img]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g425/Frostyfuz/HELPMEEEEE2.png[/img] Then it just takes me to where you type your Name & Password. -Ash

item.title: Server say's Loading - Please wait, then logs me out?
item.dc:creator: @abk14101 abk14101
item.description:
@abk14101 wrote:

go to client handler and search for sever delay and change it to false and the go to where it says disconnect change it to false

Read full topic
item.source: Server say's Loading - Please wait, then logs me out?
